properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:04AM AKST until February 12 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibilities less than one half
mile in blowing snow at times. Additional snow accumulations of
1 to 3 inches.

* WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula from Soldotna west. This
includes the Sterling Highway from Soldotna to Homer.

* WHEN...Until noon AKST today.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY
